original_text: And God created great whales, and every living creature that moveth, which the waters brought forth abundantly, after their kind, and every winged fowl after his kind: and God saw that it was good.
korean_text: 하나님이 큰 바다 짐승들과 물에서 번성하여 움직이는 모든 생물을 그 종류대로, 날개 있는 모든 새를 그 종류대로 창조하시니 하나님이 보시기에 좋았더라

sentences.original_text: and every living creature that moveth
which the waters brought forth abundantly
and every winged fowl after his kind
sentences.korean_translation: 날개 있는 모든 새를 각 종류대로 창조하셨다

sentences.original_text: and God saw that it was good
